column5: Is that the wife or the ex girlfriend???
We're out of scotch and stores are closed
Nothing too dramatic Roy (except for being out of scotch). Pix will need to wait until I get home and download some video. Actually pretty calm right now, I think maybe the 'eye' is passing through??
Theres a time zone change between you and us is'nt there Simon .
Nothing worse than running out of scotch at breakfast but I'm sure you can get used to screech easily enough.
out of scotch and stores are closed ? arrrg, guess with Leslie around, a trip to St. Pierre is out of the question...

No scotch? Someone must have some shine hanging around  Where I'm from, if the store is closed, we knock on the door, and they let us in....any hour of the day or night!! Gotta love small towns full of good people!!  St. Johns is a little different. Too city like for me!!  S.
No up date Simon , are you stuck up in a tree , or better ... passed out under one .......lol .
I'll send an update when I can get on the Internet Skip. No world wide web here in Dildo NF.
I spent a week there one night
It must be just about that time when Simon is to return to OFC with his report in hand ?

Scotch and cigars are packed. Hurricane gear as well, just in case. Leaving tomorrow 1030  and reeking  terror in St. John's by 1530. Lock up your sisters me brudders, Pikeslayer is comin to town.  Okay, so assuming I'm not in bed by 1900, I'm looking for fun & memories. Feel free to chime in. Will travel overnites max 3 hrs and returning next Saturday. Keep in mind I'm traveling with the Missus and ex girlfriend + hubby (it's complicated)  Behave yourselves,  Slayer  ps. Does what happens on The Rock stay on The Rock?????

enjoy Simon - and take notes - we're thinking of heading out there next year - we need some pointers. And no, I'm not touching I'm traveling with the Missus and ex girlfriend + hubby (it's complicated)  That goes beyond catch and release.
That is one of the best lines I've read here in years.
Have fun Simon, try to behave a little bit
Have a blast, Simon!!!
Watch out for moose!!!   Other than that, the best people in the world will take good care of you. I will guarantee it. You will have a hard time leaving!  Have a great trip!  S.
Try and make sure you have time for a drive outta St. John's, beautiful country. Cape Spear for first sunrise in North America as well. Have a great time (hard not to really) !

How detailed would you like the notes Rick??  Coming from you Rob, that's huge  I figure at the end of the trip, Pergatory would be a fair deal Joey  Oh you know I will Frankie  Actually planning on some moose to keep the budget in check.   Cape Spear sunrise is at the top of the list. I've seen the sun set in Victoria so this will be cool.
Enjoy!  As for "what happens on the rock..."  I doubt it
LOL Dan. Thought it was your anniversary today

I came running when i heard you were leaving , don't worry about us , we'll all be just fine and you go enjoy your self now and don't worry about a thing .  I'll be around to check on every thing for you just like i said i would , wait where did you say you left the key , o' never mind i'll find it , now your the guy with the fishy tank not the people with the dog and the cat , don't worry Simon i've got it all under control you run along and have a good trip and i'll see ya when you get back . Where in the hell did i put dis guys address ...................................dam it .
What Shane said X 10000000000. The best people on the earth.  Have a super time Simon.
Go east old man, go east and have some fun........
Just checked the weather;  http://www.nhc.noaa.gov/graphics_at2.shtml?5-daynl
Have a good time...you'll be fine Simon.
Ok Boss....Phone call placed.Your contact will be waiting at designated rendez vous point.Bring lots of "peanuts". Big Bear.......out
Have a great trip Simon.  You are a lucky man.
Yeah and isn't it strange that the harder he works, the luckier he gets.
Hope you're havin' a good time. Best of luck on the fishing!
Leslie has arrived
Hope Leslie isn't blowing too hard, Simon. Pictures, we want pictures. Hope you're having a great time.
Batt'n down yer hatches,tape up the billy boots, and keep yer  to the wind. Be safe bud
Eat, DRINK and Beat Leslie.........
